name: 林群哲　Office Hours
objective: Biomaterials is an introductory course designed for biomaterial compositions, manufacture, functionality and implant ability. Biomaterials included in the course are sutures, vascular grafts, artificial organs, artificial tissues, etc. In addition, biocompatibility, biodegradability, carcinogenicity and toxicity of biomaterials are presented in detail.
schedule:
1 week (9/12-9/16, 2022)　　Overview of biomaterials
2 week (9/19-9/23, 2022)　　Basic properties of organic materials
3 week (9/26-9/30, 2022)　　Biological systems (1)
4 week (10/3-10/7, 2022)　　Biological systems (2)
5 week (10/10-10/14, 2022)　　Characterization of biomaterials (1)
6 week (10/17-10/21, 2022)　　Characterization of biomaterials (2)
7 week (10/24-10/28, 2022)　　Organic polymers (1)
8 week (10/31-11/4, 2022)　　Organic polymers (2)
9 week (11/7-11/11, 2022)　　Midterm exam
10 week (11/14-11/18, 2022)　　Natural biomaterials (1) 
11 week (11/21-11/25, 2022)　　Natural biomaterials (2)
12 week (11/28-12/2, 2022)　　Surface modification
13 week(12/5-12/9, 2022)　　Drug delivery systems (1)
14 week (12/12-12/16, 2022)　　Drug delivery systems (2)
15 week (12/19-12/23, 2022)　　Bioapplications of nanoparticles (1)
16 week (12/26-12/30, 2022)　　Bioapplications of nanoparticles (2)
17 week (1/2-1/6, 2023)　　        Paper report
18 week (1/9-1/13, 2023)　　Final Exam
scorePolicy:
